title: iMac (21.5-inch, Mid 2010) A1311
message:
I want to add an SSD to this imac but keep the hdd too inside, does it matter the SSD is connected to the optical drive slot with a ssd caddy, or the SATA slot where the HDD was connected? is it the same speed?
The easiest would be to just throw the optical drive and install the SSD in the converter caddy, unless it is a slower SATA connection than for the HDD.

title: iMac (21.5-inch, Mid 2010) A1311
message: I don't want to sound mean, but this section is for MacBook logic board repair questions...

title: iMac (21.5-inch, Mid 2010) A1311
message: iMac questions are fine here. You can put the SSD in an ODD caddy and boot from there.
